title: Jump Game V
content:
Given an array of integers  and an integer . In one step you can jump from index  to index:

In addition, you can only jump from index  to index  if  and  for all indices  between  and  (More formally ).
You can choose any index of the array and start jumping. Return the maximum number of indices you can visit.
Notice that you can not jump outside of the array at any time.
